Flea.title: Flea market management software
Flea.description: Managing a flea market event and the allocation of customers to available booths can be a pain to administrate. Especially when complexity is added to the mix. Typically, flea markets are held outdoors in the summer months or when the weather allows for it; but when they are held indoors, organisers would have to comply with the proposed guidelines and rules set by the local fire regulating authorities. This involves having a static layout for the available booths and their respective tables or other accessory. Furthermore, when patron customers expect to get the same booth placements for recurring attendances, and various requirements from different customers gets proposed (such as a preferred placement or external needs such as access to a power outlet), and the organisation agrees to accommodate such requests - complexity inevitably increases.

SME.title: Simple Math Evaluation
SME.description: A simple single header libary for evaluating mathatical expressions.

SXML.title: Simple XML Parser
SXML.description: A simple single header libary for parsing xml into a DOM like structure.

QMK.title: QMK Animation Generator
QMK.description: Convert a sequence of PNGS or a GIF to a compressed QMK OLED animation.
